spec_data.Name: python2-avocado-plugins-runner-vm
spec_data.Description:
Allows Avocado to run jobs on a libvirt based VM, by means of
interaction with a libvirt daemon and an SSH connection to the VM
itself. Avocado must be previously installed on the VM.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 09 Aug 2017 05:06:36 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Avocado Runner for libvirt VM Execution
